bosses.name: The DARKNESS
bosses.description:
Suddenly you wake up.

 Where are you?

 It doesn't matter right now. There seems to be a pressing darkness, from all sides. You happen to be deathly afraid of the dark, so you decide to make the dark deathly afraid of you, and by deathly afraid you mean DEAD

bosses.name: A DARKER darkness
bosses.description:
It seems you managed to get rid of that annoying darkness. Wait, you can kinda see. What’s that ove-

Suddenly, you’re engulfed into another darkness. But wait, this one's different. This one is darker, tougher, rougher. This one is actively trying to snuff you out! It obviously has to die.

bosses.name: A Blindfold
bosses.description:
Ah. Finally. You have shaken the darkness off.

Wait. Shaken off? What is this?

 The Blindfold that was on your face turns around and attacks! No time to look around.
bosses.flavor_text: The blindfold was actually around your head the whole time you just didn't notice.
